sections.heading: on foreign personal representative
sections.text: Service of process may be made upon the foreign personal representative who has submitted himself or herself to the jurisdiction of the court under section 30-2509 or is subject to jurisdiction under section 30-2510 in the manner provided for service of a summons i

30-2511.Service on foreign personal representative.

Service of process may be made upon the foreign personal representative who has submitted himself or herself to the jurisdiction of the court under section 30-2509 or is subject to jurisdiction under section 30-2510 in the manner provided for service of a summons in a civil action.

SourceLaws 1974, LB 354, ยง 217, UPC ยง 4-303;Laws 1983, LB 447, ยง 45.
